ValidationRule.name: EndsWithComma
ValidationRule.message: A string must end with comma.

ValidationRule.name: OpenFileDialogFilter
ValidationRule.message: A string must conform to Open/Save dialog filter list.

ValidationRule.name: StartsWithSpace
ValidationRule.message: A string must start with space.

ValidationRule.name: EndsWithSpace
ValidationRule.message: A string must end with space.
